ComicInfo.Summary: Witch Hunt Part 1: Sara is in a coma and Jake is sitting at her hospital bedside when special investigator Patrick Gleason shows up trying to figure out what happened to her. He notices an elderly Asian man hanging around and follows him back to a curio shop where he fails to get any solid answers from the enigmatic Curator. Back at the hospital, Sara wakes up.

ComicInfo.Title: Witch Hunt Part 1
